courseName: Canine Impact: Exploring the Dog-Human Relationship
notes: This course explores the significance of dogs in a human world from various perspectives, including biological, ethical, historical, psychological, and social. Topics include the evolution of the domestic canid, construction of breeds, and the dog's role as protector, hunter, and companion. The course utilizes readings, discussions, media, debates, observation, and experience to explore the complexities of the canine-human relationship.
